parameters.name: grantType
parameters.description: token grant type; 'client_credentials' or 'request_token'

parameters.name: grantRequest
parameters.description: for 'client_credentials' use the secret key generated during the partner registration; for 'request_token' use the JWT request token built according to the Public API Integration Guide

post.description: creates a public api user registration for an e-Transfer customer; the operation is asynchronous, a notification will be sent to the third party partner when the registration is created

location.description: URL for accessing the newly created user registration

apiRegistrationId.description: id of the newly created user registration

403.description: Forbidden - The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

value.message: Allowed feature list not supported for user
Customer doesn't exist - ParticipantUserId doesn't exist

get.description: retrieves a public api user registration for an e-Transfer customer

delete.description: deletes a public api user registration for an e-Transfer customer

patch.description: updates a public api user registration for an e-Transfer customer

403.description: Forbidden - The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

value.message: Allowed feature list not supported for user

parameters.name: fromLastUpdatedDate
parameters.description: UTC datatime of contact used to retrieve only contacts updated from the specified dateTime; format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset is starting point of contacts filter; if offset is not provided it would be defaulted to zero;

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
contacts will be sorted based on sortBy column, 
 - sortBy will be set to contactUpdatedDate if fromLastUpdatedDate.
 - sortBy will be defaulted to contactName if no filters are specified.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: order by is required if sort by is specified.

schema.description: List of contacts returned for customer

206.description: Partial content returned, use pagination filters

x-total-count.description: total number of contacts for provided filter.

schema.description: List of partial contacts returned based on max item

value.message: Hard contact already exist for sender.

403.description: Forbidden - The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

value.message: Feature is not supported for current user

post.description: creates a public api user registration for an e-Transfer customer

location.description: URL for accessing the newly created contact

contactId.description: Id of the newly created Contact.

contactHash.description: unique hash value of newly created Contact.

403.description: Forbidden - The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

value.message: Feature is not supported for current user.

put.description: updates a contact for an e-Transfer customer

contactHash.description: unique hash value of newly created Contact.

value.message: Invalid contact hash, get last updated contact details

403.description: Forbidden - The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

value.message: Feature is not supported for current user.

delete.description: deletes a contact for an e-Transfer customer

value.message: Contact can't be deleted; if in flight transfers exist.

403.description: Forbidden - The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

value.message: Feature is not supported for current user.

get.description: retrieves a contact of an e-Transfer customer that has a public api registartion and the associated auto-deposit registration details if the registration exists and is associated with one of contact's notification handles

403.description: Forbidden - The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

value.message: Feature is not supported for current user.

get.description: retrieves all transfers sent/received ( Bulk transfers are exluded )

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: UTC datatime format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'; this parameter is mandatory if sourceTransferId or referenceNumber is not given.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: UTC datatime format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'; this parameter is mandatory if sourceTransferId or referenceNumber is not given.

parameters.name: maxResponseItems
parameters.description: if offset is provided then maxResponse items is required; all items are returned if this field is absent

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset is starting point of transfers filter; if offset is not provided it would be defaulted to zero;

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: transfers will be sorted based on sortBy column.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: order by is required if sort by is specified.

parameters.name: sourceTransferId
parameters.description: transferId generated by originating system, either source transfer id or reference number can be specified.

parameters.name: referenceNumber
parameters.description: unique identifier of the transfer, either source transfer id or reference number can be specified.

206.description: Partial content returned, use pagination filters

post.description: creates a transfer for an e-Transfer customer; the operation is asynchronous, a notification will be sent to the third party partner when the transfer is created

location.description: URL for accessing the newly created transfer

referenceNumber.description: reference Number of the newly created transfer

value.message: Invalid contact hash, get last updated contact details
Contact has notification handle registered for direct deposit, regular transfer cannot be sent
Sender and Recipient cannot be same customer
Transfer amount exceeds the individual outgoing transfer threshold
Total cumulative transfers exceeds the daily outgoing transfer amount threshold
Total cumulative transfers exceeds the first rolling limit outgoing transfer amount threshold
Total cumulative transfers exceeds the second rolling limit outgoing transfer amount threshold
Expiry Date is less than Creation Date
Transfer creation date is too early or too late
Invalid Transfer authentication for the Transfer type.
Hash algorithm not supported by the system.
Fullfill amount should be same as requested amount.
Transfer can't be created, due to intrruption in previous transfer.
Currency code or product type is not supported.

the sender updates the transfer authentication

patch.description: the recipient completes the receive of a transfer; the operation is asynchronous, a notification will be sent to the third party partner when the transfer is completed

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: UTC datatime format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'; this parameter is mandatory if sourceMoneyRequestId or referenceNumber is not given.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: UTC datatime format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'; this parameter is mandatory if sourceMoneyRequestId or referenceNumber is not given.

parameters.name: maxResponseItems
parameters.description: if offset is provided then maxResponse items is required; all ( OR maximum set by example system ) items are returned if this field is absent

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset is starting point of money-requests filter; if offset is not provided it would be defaulted  to zero;

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: money-requests will be sorted based on sortBy column.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: order by is required if sort by is specified.

parameters.name: sourceMoneyRequestId
parameters.description: id created at originating system

parameters.name: referenceNumber
parameters.description: unique money request reference Number

post.description: creates a money request for an e-Transfer customer

location.description: URL for accessing the newly created money request

referenceNumber.description: reference Number of the newly created money request

paymentGatewayUrl.description: the payment gateway url for money request fullfilment

Notice cannot be sent. Notifications are supressed for this Money Request.

thirdPartyAccessId.name: thirdPartyAccessId
thirdPartyAccessId.description: unique id that identifies a third party partner

requestId.name: requestId
requestId.description: partner generated unique id for each request used for message tracking purposes

accessToken.name: accessToken
accessToken.description: OAuth2 access token, the format is 'Bearer AccessToken'.

apiRegistrationId.name: apiRegistrationId
apiRegistrationId.description: unique identifier for the user api registration

etransfer_auth.description: This API uses OAuth 2 with the client credential grant flow.

expiresIn.description: how many seconds the token will expire

apiRegistrationId.description: unique identifier for the user api registration; not required in POST request

participantId.description: participant id in e-Transfer system; required if api registration is created through the public api and directDepositRegistration is not specified.

indirectConnectorId.description: indirect connector id in e-Transfer system

participantUserId.description: participant defined user id in e-Transfer system; required if api registration is created through the public api and directDepositRegistration is not specified.

participantApiRegistrationId.description: participant defined identifier for this Api registration; required if api registration is created through the public api

fiAccountId.description: unique identifier set by financial institution corresponding to the user's bank account; required if api registration is created through the public api and directDepositRegistration is not specified.

registrationStatus.description: status of the user registration request 'pending','active','inactive','failed','in-review'

items.description: functionality allowed to be used through this API; 'contact_mgmnt', 'send_money_requests', 'fulfill_money_requests', 'send_transfers', 'receive_transfers', 'user_registration_mgmnt' The below feature's are only for external app's, which doesn't need to be synchronized with online banking transfers, contacts and money requests  'contact_mgmnt_ext_api', 'money_request_mgmt_ext_api,'transfer_mgmt_ext_api'

thirdPartyUserId.description: unique third party partner defined user id in e-Transfer system

allowedFeatures.description:
functionality allowed to be used through this API; 'contact_mgmnt',
 'send_money_requests', 'fulfill_money_requests', 'send_transfers',
 'receive_transfers', 'user_registration_mgmnt'
 The below feature's are only for external app's, which doesn't need to be synchronized with online banking transfers, contacts and money requests 
 'contact_mgmnt_ext_api', 'money_request_mgmt_ext_api,'transfer_mgmt_ext_api'

fiAccountId.description: updated fi account id; unique identifier set by financial institution corresponding to the user's bank account

CustomerDetails.description: auto deposit registration details associated with a notification handle or hard contact customer details.

registrationName.description: name used by the customer to register in e-Transfer system

DirectDepositRegistration.description: auto deposit registration details associated with a notification handle

directDepositRegistrationId.description: unique identifier of the direct depost registration in e-Transfer system

directDepositHandle.description: email address, phone number or unique user identifier

handle.description: Email address (format a@b.ca) or mobile phone number ( format 123-222-7777 )

active.description: specifies if notifications will not be sent

contactId.description: unique identifier for the contact; not required in POST request

contactName.description: unique contact name to be provided for each contacts.

contactHash.description: unique hash value to identify version of contact, not required in POST request

language.description: language used to notify this contact

thirdPartyUserId.description: unique third party partner defined user id in e-Transfer system

hardContactStatus.description: status of hard contact, if customer is disabled or de reg

directDepositRegistration.description: direct deposit registration associated with a contact notification handle

customerDetails.description: customer details associated the hard contract or the auto deposit registration associated with one of the contact notification handles

onUs.description: the registered user and the coustomer associated with the direct deposit registration have the same financial institution

securityAnswer.description: answer to the security question (as provided by the customer) with leading and trailing whitespace trimmed, uppercased, postfixed with hashSalt if present, hashed using the alghoritm identified by hashType and then Base64 encoded. ISO-8859-1 encoding to be used when the hash is generated, values not returned in GET requests for security reasons.

hashType.description: alghorithm used to hash the security answer; it has to be one of values supported by the system

hashSalt.description: required if hashType is not MD5, values not returned in GET requests for security reasons.

securityAnswer.description: answer to the security question (as provided by the customer) with leading and trailing whitespace trimmed, uppercased, postfixed with hashSalt if present, hashed using the alghoritm identified by hashType and then Base64 encoded. ISO-8859-1 encoding to be used when the hash is generated

invoiceNumber.description: number of the invoice to be paid

dueDate.description: UTC date  of  the invoice is to be paid by; format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'

referenceNumber.description: unique identifier for the money request; this field should not be specified in the POST request

sourceMoneyRequestId.description: unique identifier of the money request in the originating system

requestedFrom.description: Responder details of the money request, required for get money request.

contactId.description: Unique identifier for the contact; required for permanent contact.

contactHash.description: unique hash value to identify version of contact;required for permanent contact.

contactName.description: contact name, required for onetime contact.

language.description: language used to notify this contact, required for onetime contact.

notificationPreferences.description: notification preferences for the contact, required for onetime contact.

currency.description: the currency of the requested amount; only CAD is supported for now

editableFulfillAmount.description: flag indicating if the transfer amount can be different from the requested amount

expiryDate.description: UTC datatime this money request is valid until; format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'

supressResponderNotifications.description: if flag is on, Interac will not send notifications to the intended responder; the requester is expected to handle the notification part themselves. If requestedFrom is not specified, supressResponderNotifications has to be true.

returnURL.description: return URL to redirect the Responder after the Money Request fulfillment

creationDate.description: UTC datatime of creation for this request; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests; format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'

status.description: Does not need to be provided at request creation time; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests | - REQUEST_INITIATED(1) - AVAILABLE_TO_BE_FULFILLED(2) - REQUEST_FULFILLED(3) - DECLINED(4) - CANCELLED(5) - EXPIRED(6) - DEPOSIT_FAILED(7) - REQUEST_COMPLETED(8)

fulfillAmount.description: the fulfilled amount; to not be specified in POST or PUT requests; present if status is completed

responderMessage.description: message from the responder; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests

notificationStatus.description: indicates the status of the notifications sent to the recipient; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests | SENT(0) PENDING(1) PENDING_SEND_FAILURE(2) DELIVERY_FAILURE(3)

requesterDetails.description: customer details associated with the requester of the money request

handle.description: Email address or mobile phone number

referenceNumber.description: unique identifier for the transfer; this field should not be specified in the POST request

sourceTransferId.description: unique identifier of the transfer in the originating system

sentTo.description: Receipient details of the transfers, required for outgoing or get transfers

contactId.description: Unique identifier for the contact; required for permanent contact transfers.

contactHash.description: unique hash value to identify version of contact;required for permanent contact transfers.

contactName.description: contact name, required for onetime contact.

language.description: language used to notify this contact, required for onetime contact.

notificationPreferences.description: notification preferences for the contact, required for onetime contact.

currency.description: the currency of the sent amount; only CAD is supported for now

transferAuthentication.description: transfer authentication required for regular transfers

requestReferenceNumber.description: reference number of the money request to be fufilled; required for money request fulfillment

expiryDate.description: UTC datatime this transfer is valid until; format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'

supplementaryInfo.description: supplementaryInfo is required for POST request, as we have to capture where the request came from.

ipAddress.description: IP address used by the user

creationDate.description: UTC datatime of creation for this transfer; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests; format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'

senderRegistrationName.description: name used by the sender to register in e-Transfer system; this field should not be specified in POST, PUT  or PATCH requests

receivedDate.description: UTC datatime when this transfer was completed/received; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests; format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'

status.description: Does not need to be provided at request creation time; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests | - TRANSFER_CREATION_INITIATED(21) - TRANSFER_CREATION_IN_PROCESS(22) - TRANSFER_CREATION_FAILED(23) - TRANSFER_CREATED(1) - TRANSFER_AVAILABLE(3) - AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE(5) - AUTHENTICATION_SUCCESSFUL(6) - DECLINED(7) - CANCELLED(8) - EXPIRED(9) - DIRECT_DEPOSIT_PENDING(17) - DIRECT_DEPOSIT_FAILED(18) - COMPLETED(10)

recipientMessage.description: message from the recipient; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests

transactionType.description: type of the transactions sent or received.

notificationStatus.description: indicates the status of the notifications sent to the recipient; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests | SENT(0) PENDING(1) PENDING_SEND_FAILURE(2) DELIVERY_FAILURE(3)

currency.description: the currency of the sent amount; only CAD is supported for now

expiryDate.description: UTC datatime this transfer is valid until; format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z', e.g. '2016-09-11T16:12:12.000'

senderRegistrationName.description: name used by the sender to register in e-Transfer system; this field should not be specified in POST or PUT requests

recipientLanguage.description: recipient's preferred language as defined by the sender

status.description: Incoming Transfer statuses | TRANSFER_AVAILABLE(3) AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE(5) AUTHENTICATION_SUCCESSFUL(6) DECLINED(7) CANCELLED(8) EXPIRED(9) DIRECT_DEPOSIT_PENDING(17) DIRECT_DEPOSIT_FAILED(18) COMPLETED(10)

authenticationRequired.description: true if recipient authentication is required

hashType.description: alghorithm used to hash the security answer by the sending party

hashSalt.description: salt used to hash the security answer by the sending party

code.description:
Error list for all the API's, please refer example tag for api specific error code.
1000 Invalid request.
1001 Invalid access.
1002 Allowed feature list not supported for user.
1003 Customer doesn't exist - ParticipantUserId doesn't exist.
1004 Duplicate User registration.
1005 ApiRegistartionId doesn't exist.
1006 Hard contact doesn't exist.
1007 Contact doesn't exist.
1008 Duplicate ThirdPartyUserId.
1009 Invalid ParticipantId.
1010 Invalid IndirectConnectorId of participant.
1011 Invalid apiRegistartionId.
1012 Retrive last updated contact details, contact hash invalid.
1013 Contact has notification handle registered for direct deposit, regular transfer cannot be sent.
1014 Sender and Recipient cannot be same customer.
1015 Sender is disabled.
1016 Transfer amount exceeds the individual outgoing transfer threshold.
1017 Total cumulative transfers exceeds the daily outgoing transfer amount threshold.
1018 Total cumulative transfers exceeds the first rolling limit outgoing transfer amount threshold.
1019 Total cumulative transfers exceeds the second rolling limit outgoing transfer amount threshold.
1020 Duplicate source system id.
1021 Expiry Date is less than Creation Date.
1022 Contact is not registered for direct deposit, direct deposit cannot be sent.
1023 Expiry Date exceeds threshold limit.
1024 Invalid Transfer authentication for the Transfer type.
1025 Money request doesn't exist.
1026 Direct deposit registration doesn't exist.
1027 Hash algorithm not supported by the system.
1028 Fullfill amount should be same as requested amount.
1029 Transfer doesn't exist.
1030 Invalid date range.
1031 Mutually exclusive options are specified.
1032 Hash Salt is required if hashtype is not MD5.
1033 Request cannot be processed due to current status.
1034 Authentication failed, try again later.
1035 Authentication failed, can't try later.
1036 Transfer was authenticated by a different customer.
1037 Feature is not supported for current user.
1038 Outgoing money request amount threshold exceeded.
1039 Maximum number of outgoing money requests threshold exceeded.
1040 Customer can't send money request to Recipient/Contact.
1041 Invoice due date exceeds the money request expiry date.
1042 Exceeded max number of notifications for the Money Request.
1043 Duplicate contact name.
1044 Contact can't be deleted if there are in flight transfers.
1045 Transfer can't be created, due to intrruption in previous transfer.
1046 Currency code or product type is not supported.
1047 Invalid Transfer type.
1048 Hard contact already exist for sender.
1049 Customer blocked to send money request notifications to Recipient/Contact
1050 Editable fulfill amount is not supported for requesting customer.
1051 Recipient  / Responder is disabled.
1052 Notice cannot be sent. Notifications are supressed for this Money Request.
1053 Invalid Direct deposit registration handle.
1054 supressResponderNotifications has to be true when RequestedFrom is not specified.
